lead_paragraph: Mexico-based midfielder Guido Pizarro was called up for the first time by Argentina on Wednesday for their 2018 World Cup qualifiers next month.

headline.print_headline: Mexico-Based Midfielder Pizarro Gets First Argentina Call
headline.main: Mexico-Based Midfielder Pizarro Gets First Argentina Call

snippet: Mexico-based midfielder Guido Pizarro was called up for the first time by Argentina on Wednesday for their 2018 World Cup qualifiers next month....
